Encryption.description: Information about the encryption of the flow.

Algorithm.description: The type of algorithm that is used for the encryption (such as aes128, aes192, or aes256).
Algorithm.markdownDescription:
The type of algorithm that is used for the encryption (such as aes128, aes192, or aes256).

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: aes128 | aes192 | aes256  
Update requires: No interruption

ConstantInitializationVector.description: A 128-bit, 16-byte hex value represented by a 32-character string, to be used with the key for encrypting content. This parameter is not valid for static key encryption.
ConstantInitializationVector.markdownDescription:
A 128-bit, 16-byte hex value represented by a 32-character string, to be used with the key for encrypting content. This parameter is not valid for static key encryption.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

DeviceId.description: The value of one of the devices that you configured with your digital rights management (DRM) platform key provider. This parameter is required for SPEKE encryption and is not valid for static key encryption.
DeviceId.markdownDescription:
The value of one of the devices that you configured with your digital rights management (DRM) platform key provider. This parameter is required for SPEKE encryption and is not valid for static key encryption.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

KeyType.description: The type of key that is used for the encryption. If no keyType is provided, the service will use the default setting (static-key).
KeyType.markdownDescription:
The type of key that is used for the encryption. If no keyType is provided, the service will use the default setting (static-key).

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: speke | static-key  
Update requires: No interruption

Region.description: The AWS Region that the API Gateway proxy endpoint was created in. This parameter is required for SPEKE encryption and is not valid for static key encryption.
Region.markdownDescription:
The AWS Region that the API Gateway proxy endpoint was created in. This parameter is required for SPEKE encryption and is not valid for static key encryption.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

ResourceId.description: An identifier for the content. The service sends this value to the key server to identify the current endpoint. The resource ID is also known as the content ID. This parameter is required for SPEKE encryption and is not valid for static key encryption.
ResourceId.markdownDescription:
An identifier for the content. The service sends this value to the key server to identify the current endpoint. The resource ID is also known as the content ID. This parameter is required for SPEKE encryption and is not valid for static key encryption.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

RoleArn.description: The ARN of the role that you created during setup (when you set up AWS Elemental MediaConnect as a trusted entity).
RoleArn.markdownDescription:
The ARN of the role that you created during setup (when you set up AWS Elemental MediaConnect as a trusted entity).

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

SecretArn.description: The ARN of the secret that you created in AWS Secrets Manager to store the encryption key. This parameter is required for static key encryption and is not valid for SPEKE encryption.
SecretArn.markdownDescription:
The ARN of the secret that you created in AWS Secrets Manager to store the encryption key. This parameter is required for static key encryption and is not valid for SPEKE encryption.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

Url.description: The URL from the API Gateway proxy that you set up to talk to your key server. This parameter is required for SPEKE encryption and is not valid for static key encryption.
Url.markdownDescription:
The URL from the API Gateway proxy that you set up to talk to your key server. This parameter is required for SPEKE encryption and is not valid for static key encryption.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

Encryption.markdownDescription:
Information about the encryption of the flow.

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

FlowArn.markdownDescription:
The ARN of the flow.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

EntitlementArn.markdownDescription:
The ARN of the entitlement.

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption
Read only property: Yes

DataTransferSubscriberFeePercent.description: Percentage from 0-100 of the data transfer cost to be billed to the subscriber.
DataTransferSubscriberFeePercent.markdownDescription:
Percentage from 0-100 of the data transfer cost to be billed to the subscriber.

Type: Integer  
Update requires: Replacement

Description.markdownDescription:
A description of the entitlement.

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

Encryption.description: The type of encryption that will be used on the output that is associated with this entitlement.
Encryption.markdownDescription:
The type of encryption that will be used on the output that is associated with this entitlement.

EntitlementStatus.description: An indication of whether the entitlement is enabled.
EntitlementStatus.markdownDescription:
An indication of whether the entitlement is enabled.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: ENABLED | DISABLED  
Update requires: No interruption

Name.markdownDescription:
The name of the entitlement.

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Update requires: Replacement

Subscribers.description: The AWS account IDs that you want to share your content with. The receiving accounts (subscribers) will be allowed to create their own flow using your content as the source.

items.markdownDescription:
